Just how luxurious exactly are these ingredients for them to warrant such high prices?

programme.title: Frontline - EP 28
programme.desc: The $500 SkillsFuture Credit issued in 2020 will expire in two months, yet 70% of Singaporeans have not used it. How should one choose the right course for themselves? What about floral arrangement or baking? While solar power is a promising source of renewable energy for Singapore, with green plans on the Open Electricity Market claiming to provide "100% solar power", what should consumers look out for? Does 2 hours of cycling generate power?

programme.title: The Gift of Time - EP 12
programme.desc: Jinmei dies. Tianyu’s eulogy moves everyone to tears. Xiatong tells Shuimiao she has no desire to meet her father. Yaolin suspects Huoyan’s intentions after knowing his past. To change Xiatong’s view of him, Huoyan tries to find a doctor to help Ruoxi and Yongjie conceive, to no avail. Sparks fly when Yaolin asks Xiatong out for a meal. Their date is interrupted by Huoyan’s frantic call.

programme.title: Talk of the Town - EP 81
programme.desc: A half-hour talk-show segment in Hello Singapore which brings together diverse voices and expert opinions to thought-provoking discussions on wide range of issues. programme.title: Focus - EP 24
programme.desc: US President Trump meets with Chinese President Xi in Busan, South Korea. Is it the beginning of cooperation or the prelude to new power struggles? Is the role of international multilateral organizations waning? What impact is this having on the international order? The SFCCA celebrates its 40th anniversary this year. programme.desc: Rancangan "prank" yang berlaku di pejabat Astro, melibatkan pekerja-pekerja yang selalunya tidak menjangka akan sesuatu berlaku. Rancangan ini dikepalai oleh beberapa "prankster" dari Thinker Studios.

programme.title: Ek Eleh! Afdlin! Afdlin - EP 4
programme.desc: Program wawancara yang memaparkan sketsa, permainan selebriti dan pentas lawak Dato' Afdlin Shauki.

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 2
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin & Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: Pecah Perut - EP 3
programme.desc: Sebuah program sketsa komedi yang menampilkan barisan pelawak dan pelakon popular seperti Kamal Adli, Sherry Al-Hadad, Shahrul Shiro, Mamak Puteh dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: Kak Lina Ter-Over Take Over - EP 6
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Kak Lina Pom Pom yang kecoh dan lucu bersama para tetamu jemputan melakukan cabaran istimewa yang pasti mencuit hati anda sekeluarga.

programme.title: Dr. Pontianak S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara yang unik di mana entiti menjadi tumpuan utama! Mengkaji mitos dan memecahkan stigma sosial tentang alam ghaib sambil memberi anda gambaran tentang dunia mereka.

programme.title: Kebun Urban - EP 8
programme.desc: Razif akan menemuramah serta mencungkil rahsia petani-petani kecilan di Malaysia yang menanam sayuran dihalaman rumah mereka. Razif dan Sherson Lian akan memasak resipi ringkas menggunakan tanaman mereka.

programme.title: Makers Malaysia - EP 8
programme.desc: Makers Malaysia mengetengahkan individu-individu dalam pelbagai bidang seni kreatif seperti fesyen, pereka kasut, dan sebagainya. Individu tersebut akan berkongsi inspirasi dan proses yang terlibat.

programme.title: Sepenggal Puisi - EP 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang konflik 2 buah keluarga, satu di Yogyakarta dan satu di Kuala Lumpur. Rahsia yang di simpan selama 30 tahun terbongkar apabila Fariz ke Yogyakarta untuk mendapatkan kepastian.

programme.title: Tikam - EP 2
programme.desc: NJ, Akma, Ed, Ika, Mike dan Sap menjumpai mayat Shahrol, mati bunuh diri di pejabat. Rupanya kegiatan pecah amanah mereka telah bocor dan di antara mereka adalah pengkhianat.

programme.title: Casa Impiana - EP 4
programme.desc: Program hiasan yang akan memaparkan keunikan dan keindahan rumah yang dibuat sendiri oleh pemiliknya. Tuan rumah berkongsi rahsia cara untuk mencantikkan rumah dari segi idea, petua dan citarasa peribadi.

programme.title: Celup - EP 5
programme.desc: Hidup Ria yang mewah berubah sekelip mata. Demi mendapatkan harta, Ria bersubahat dengan seorang lelaki Cina iaitu Sean. Berjayakah Sean menolong Ria?

programme.title: RIAlisasi Job Selebriti - EP 5
programme.desc: Penonton berpeluang menyaksikan selebriti kesayangan mereka melakukan kerja yang tidak berkaitan dengan karier asalnya.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ngajar Oppa Kecek
programme.desc: Demi memenangi gelaran "social media influencer" terbaik, Kak Kek mempergunakan seorang jejaka Korea, Hyun untuk menaikkan jumlah 'views' videonya tanpa menyedari niatnya itu akan melukakan hati Hyun.

programme.title: Hasrat Tersirat - EP 16

programme.title: Gengster Leng Chai

programme.title: Karok La Kau! - EP 8

programme.title: Monsieur La Souris
programme.desc: Mr. La Souris, a kind vagabond with good manners, opens the doors in front of a nightclub. One evening, a car arrives containing a body. La Souris picks up the dead man's wallet. When he becomes a police suspect in the murder enquiry, he decides to carry out his own investigation.

programme.title: Les Mains Sales
programme.desc: The St Lawrence Valley, 1759. The daily life of Marie, a native slave in the service of a surgeon, is gloomy and alienating. Until the day she meets a little girl she assumes to be her child.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 7
programme.desc: Champagne, Saint-emilion, the Loire Valley and Burgundy. In France today, four exceptional wine-growing regions have been awarded the prestigous title of world heritage sites. We explore these landscapes shaped by man...

Meanwhile Nina is managing the Tierbergli alone; Toni has gone down to the valley to see his grandfather.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 28
programme.desc: This drama is unfolding silently before our eyes: countless animal species are becoming extinct. Whole swathes of wildlife are disappearing at an unprecedented rate on every continent. What does the world map of threatened species reveal? And what can we still save?

programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 16
programme.desc: Aurelia and Alan Roura are married. Alan, a skipper, is embarking on his third Vendee Globe in 2024. Aurelia remains on land. She must single-handedly manage her husband's business and the latest news from his ocean race, while balancing their family life and relationship.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1681
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. programme.title: Interieurs - EP 1
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to Beauvaisis, reputed for clay work and its factories. Then, she discovers a huge secondhand shop where Gaylord, its owner, stores objects that he has carefully chosen and retrieved by clearing uninhabited houses in the region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 52
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 48
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 9
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 26
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 17
programme.desc: A very powerful king complains that he only has sons. His is then offered the chance of having a daughter, but he has to be prepared to make innumerable sacrifices.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 18
programme.desc: In a village lives a very beautiful girl, so beautiful that people come from far and wide just to see her. Unfortunately the village has no more water. To break the curse, the young girl must be sacrificed.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 19
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 18
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres A Honfleur
programme.desc: Agitation at the port of Honfleur: the body of MP Jean-Charles Villiers is found covered in salt and sand. A staging reminiscent of the Harlequin legend. Captain Justine Leroy leads the investigation with her deputy Vianney, helped by Paul Mesnil, a former police officer turned restaurateur.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: C'est Mon Homme
programme.desc: Julien Delaunay disappeared on a battlefield during the Great War. When the press publishes a portrait of a man with amnesia, Julie is sure she recognises her husband. So they meet up again and learn to love each other all over again. However, another woman wants him...

programme.title: Nature Morte
programme.desc: Juliette, a policeman, joins her father Rimbaud, a farmer, in a field. One of his cows has been killed and butchered in the night. The young woman will lead the investigation.

programme.title: Sur La Touche
programme.desc: Amra recently left her family to start her professional footballing career. But one weekend, she decides to go home out of worry for her grandparents' health.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 8
programme.desc: Stephanie wants to buy a house with space to accommodate the whole family. Esther suggests bringing the two families together for a meal in order to calm the tensions resulting from certain misunderstandings. Cynthia has the impression that Stephanie is ashamed of her.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 9
programme.desc: With her daughters, Stephanie visits a house for which she's put in an offer. Coralie and Yoan are also planning to buy the same property. Juliette finds herself caught between her mother and her father.

programme.desc: Stephanie has received the money to buy her future house, which has everyone wondering... The rivalry between Stephanie and Esther puts Laurence in a difficult position.

programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 8
programme.desc: Direction Lucerne, for a visit to a magnificent Napoleon-style house. Next, a change of scenery! Visit to a big family home occupied by a couple and their five (adult) children.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 10
programme.desc: Les Contamines, on the south-western slopes of the Mont Blanc Massif, is home to Europe's highest nature reserve. Laurent Guillaume and the local ranger Geoffrey Garcel, head off for an autumnal hike through the heart of the Montjoie Valley.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 53
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 49
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 10
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 27
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 19
programme.desc: The cock and the snake are good friends and regularly spend time together. But the cock begins to tire of always having to clean up after each visit by the snake, who makes no attempt to leave his home clean. An argument finally breaks out between the two animals.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 20
programme.desc: The king, to put an end to the suffering endured by the mice, asks the cats to leave them alone. A truce is respected until the cats' chief returns and decides to put an end to the peace agreement.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 20
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1683
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 6
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Vieux Fusil
programme.desc: 1944. Julien Dandieu, a surgeon from Montauban, decides to send his wife and daughter to the country and greater safety. A few days later he discovers that the entire population of the village has been massacred by the Germans. Mad with grief, he sets out to hunt down those responsible.

programme.title: C'etait Pas Du Bourgogne
programme.desc: Between two phone calls, a grandfather recounts his memories from when he was 20 and from the war.

programme.title: Ma Gueule
programme.desc: 2016, during the European Cup. Stephane returns to La Louviere, his home town, to watch a match with his childhood friends, Luca and Cesare. When Italy wins, they head off to celebrate the victory in a Flemish night club. But there's a problem: Stephane is refused entry.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 1
programme.desc: After rescuing the firm's finances, Paule tries to work out how to resolve Warnier's legal difficulties. She also has to continue to cope with Irene, totally overwhelmed with her new baby. Seeing an opportunity to get rid of her, Paule offers her to buy her stake in the company.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 2
programme.desc: Paule defends a man who was the victim of domestic violence and had accidentally killed his partner. She asks a colleague, Maitre Carbon, to offer Irene a job. But just as Paule thinks she's saved her company by firing her, Irene earns some serious money for Carbon.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: In this week's episode of The 77 Percent, we explore the relationship between money and personal connections. programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: White H2 could skip the whole process that hydrogen usually has to go through. You can just extract it from the ground and use it right away. White hydrogen forms when water and iron-rich rock reacts. It does not form reservoirs, but "flows" up to the surface - in theory this could be seen as renewable as the formation process takes place in real time.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 13
programme.desc: Since joining Crystal Palace in 2021 from Mainz, Jean-Phillipe Mateta has gone on to make over 100 appearances for the Eagles and has established himself as a key figure in Oliver Glasner's side. Leading the line in both of their recent FA Cup and Community Shield triumphs, Mateta also won Silver at the 2024 Olympic Games with France.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 23
programme.desc: Still regarded as a legend in his native Belgium, Luc Nilis lit up the Pro League and Dutch football, winning numerous titles and cups with Anderlecht and PSV Eindhoven. His 2000 move to Aston Villa looked set to make him a Premier League star, but instead, it almost ended in tragedy. We catch up with the former striker to hear his incredible story and discover how his new role in coaching has become his biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 7
programme.desc: Former Premier League enforcer Kolo Toure joins Will Perry in the locker room as he unveils his top 10 Premier League moments.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 4
programme.desc: Gabby Agbonlahor sits down for 1-to-11 to reveal his ultimate Aston Villa lineup, made up of the teammates he played alongside. A true one-club man, Gabby reflects on his journey from academy prospect to first-team star, sharing stories of the players who made the biggest impact during his time at Villa Park. His Villa XI is full of character, quality, and claret-and-blue pride.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: An evergreen strand that relives classic matches, seasons and moments in the company of those who starred in them.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 13
programme.desc: Since joining Crystal Palace in 2021 from Mainz, Jean-Phillipe Mateta has gone on to make over 100 appearances for the Eagles and has established himself as a key figure in Oliver Glasner’s side. Leading the line in both of their recent FA Cup and Community Shield triumphs, Mateta also won Silver at the 2024 Olympic Games with France.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Liverpool (MW11) (Live) - EP 110
programme.desc: Liverpool won this exact fixture 2-0 last season but haven’t won consecutive away league games against Man City since a run of three between 1987 and 1991.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 23
programme.desc: Still regarded as a legend in his native Belgium, Luc Nilis lit up the Pro League and Dutch football, winning numerous titles and cups with Anderlecht and PSV Eindhoven. His 2000 move to Aston Villa looked set to make him a Premier League star, but instead, it almost ended in tragedy. We catch up with the former striker to hear his incredible story and discover how his new role in coaching has become his biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Burnley (MW11) - EP 103
programme.desc: Burnley have won just two of their last 11 top-flight away games against West Ham (D2 L7) - 3-0 in March 2018 and 1-0 in July 2020.

programme.title: Everton vs Fulham (MW11) - EP 102
programme.desc: Fulham have lost just one of their last seven Premier League games against Everton (W3 D3), though it was in their last meeting at Craven Cottage in May (1-3).

programme.title: Brentford vs Newcastle United (MW11) - EP 107
programme.desc: Brentford have won just one of their eight Premier League games against Newcastle (D1 L6), though it was a 4-2 victory in this exact fixture last season.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Liverpool (MW11) - EP 110
programme.desc: Liverpool won this exact fixture 2-0 last season but haven’t won consecutive away league games against Man City since a run of three between 1987 and 1991.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW11) - EP 105
programme.desc: Wolves have won just one of their 11 Premier League away games against Chelsea (D3 L7), picking up a 4-2 victory in February 2024.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Bournemouth (MW11) - EP 106
programme.desc: Bournemouth lost 3-1 against Manchester City last time out but haven’t lost consecutive Premier League games since May - which were defeats against Man City and Aston Villa.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Leeds United (MW11) - EP 109
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest are unbeaten in their last 13 top-flight home games against Leeds (W6 D7) since a 2-0 loss in November 1971 under Matt Gillies.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW11) - EP 108
programme.desc: Brighton’s Yankuba Minteh has been involved in 14 Premier League goals in his last two seasons (7 goals, 7 assists), the most of any player currently aged 21 or younger in the competition.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Tshilumba Mikixi vs. August Kayambala
programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: WCCB Ben Whittaker vs. Liam Cameron II
programme.desc: From Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, one of the top prospects in boxing, Olympic Silver Medalist Ben Whittaker, meets Liam Cameron in a highly anticipated light heavyweight rematch of their dramatic split draw last November. In their first meeting on the undercard of Beterbiev/Bivol from Saudi Arabia, Whittaker was unable to finish the bout when both fighters fell from the ring.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Hohhot Grand Prix, and stop to get to know the world's #1 ranked fighter Aleksandar Kukolj. We then head to Russia to witness the effect that Judo has on the Russian people.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Takarafuji, Yoshikaze, Takakeisho and Daishomaru from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Ninety competitors including 15 Wild Card selections race each other and the clock to complete Stage 1. In addition to old nemeses like the Giant Ring and Jumping Spider, contestants will face new obstacles: Piston Road and the Silk Slider.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Tshilumba Mikixi vs. August Kayambala
programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Weapons as well as Girl's Forms and Team Demo highlights.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kakuryu, Tochinoshin, Shodai and Hakuho from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Juan Diaz
programme.desc: This episode features a lightweight title bout between Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 12
programme.desc: When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 33
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa‐Laa and Po enjoy Tiddlytubbies Songtime. Then it is time for Teletubbies Songtime. The Teletubbies sing solo before singing all together.

programme.desc: The friends are joining Hooper's circus school. But when Plom struggles to find a skill he's good at, will he be able to earn his circus school certificate?

programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet an inventor in his space lab. The inventor shows them his robots.

programme.desc: Jeanie gets mad when she doesn't win a game, leaving Monty wondering whether you can turn a sore loser into a good loser.

programme.desc: When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.desc: Roly is trying to force a very large plastic ball into the bin, but it flies out and crashes into a tower that Betty has built.

programme.desc: Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitch's Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.desc: Mateo is cooking sopaipillas, made with sweet potato dough.

programme.desc: Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.desc: The pirates would love to have a midnight feast even though Captain Captain forbids it. It states in her pirate handbook that a pirates bedtime is 8 o'clock, so a midnight feast is not an option.

programme.desc: He-He finds an antique Snow Globe with a little penguin inside.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 14

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 15

programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: It’s Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the "butt xylophone" couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it’s time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 110
programme.desc: Webby is clearing out her web. Fifi takes all the unwanted objects home and uses them to play a brilliant game of shadow puppets, a perfect game to play on a rainy day!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 111
programme.desc: The twins are playing "The Three Little Pigs". Buttercup is enjoying her role as the big bad wolf rather too much and scares poor Daisy. Will Buttercup realise how upset her sister is?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 45
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Puff Adder didn't shed his skin. All the animals were afraid of Puff Adder because he was very difficult to see and he had a nasty bite. Puff Adder decides that if no beast wants to be his friend then he doesn't want to have any friends. He slithers far, far away to the desert where he bumps into Camel and learns that every animal needs a friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 46
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! programme.desc: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: CNBC On Assignment
programme.desc: CNBC goes on assignment at the biggest events around the world, bringing you interviews and insight from the most influential leaders in business, politics, activism and the arts.

programme.title: The CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record

Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. programme.title: US Squawk Box - EP 1

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. programme.title: The Seasons - EP 7

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4 - EP 298
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman - EP 595
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 502
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Our Golden Days - EP 24
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Moving Voices in Spain - EP 5
programme.desc: When you try to understand a country, is there anything that reveals more than its music? "Moving Voices" follows Korea's artists travelling to different places around the world. While they experience different countries' music and cultures, they embark on a journey to find their true self as a singer. What kind of music and stories will these singers share, as they understand the culture and people from the world?

programme.title: You Are The Best! - EP 19
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: Hello Monster - EP 11
programme.desc: I find my true self through you. A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime concealing their true intentions. Then, they fall in love with each other and starts to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies - EP 16
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar - EP 26
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 21
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: My Run, My Way - EP 2
programme.desc: My Run, My Way - Your Run-trip Guide. The moment you run, the journey begins! Travel is a way to rediscover yourself in unfamiliar places.The moment you start to run, it's no longer just sightseeing - it becomes an experience.<My Run, My Way> is a run-trip project that combines running, local travel, and recovery all in one.

programme.title: Hello Monster - EP 12
programme.desc: I find my true self through you. A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime concealing their true intentions. Then, they fall in love with each other and starts to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies - EP 17
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar - EP 27
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 23
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 24
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible 2
programme.desc: The training academy from Dogs Are Incredible! For pet owners struggling with issues like biting, aggression, or excessive barking from their beloved dogs who've become part of the family. Experts from various fields provide customized training methods and tailored advice - helping unruly dogs transform into well-behaved companions!

programme.title: The Merchant : Gaekju 2015 - EP 18
programme.desc: This drama tells a story of a successor of the ruined merchant family. Cheon Bongsam, who begins his life as a market tout, becomes the most powerful merchant of Joseon after going through experiences as a head of a private merchant army and a chief master merchant.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: Cheung Wah, a terminally ill criminal mastermind who has only days left to live, challenges police inspector Ho Sheung-sang to a daring 72-hour cat-and-mouse game across Hong Kong. Cheung orchestrates a series of heists, forcing Ho to match his wit.

programme.title: Listen To Your Body - EP 1
programme.desc: Your mouth may say no, but your body tells a different story. Whenever subtle changes occur in your internal organs, they are actually revealing the truth about your health! Dr. Mok Shu-Kam, a highly accomplished doctor in the medical field, along with Li Jiaxin, He Peijia, and Liang Chaoyi, will each episode focus on a specific health area, exploring how abnormal conditions in different organs can indicate potential problems, ranging from minor to serious illnesses.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 6
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: Destined - EP 18
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 19
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 37
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi (Luo Jin) conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang (Yin Fang) an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 8
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 9
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Family By Choice - EP 16
programme.desc: Three unrelated individuals—Jin Sanha (Hwang In Yeop), Yoon Joowan (Jung Chae Yeon), and Kang Haijoon (Bae Hyun Sung)—become family for each other due to changes in their respective families. Ten years later, the trio reunite, kicking off a youthful romance.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 6
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 97
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls ‘father’ is actually her real parents’ enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey…

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 98
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls ‘father’ is actually her real parents’ enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey…

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2077
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 701-750) VVD Mandarin - EP 749
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 4
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Tai Cho-fuk’s decoys infiltrated the police force all those years ago. And now Ko Ho-yin suspects there must be more than one mole in the force, so he’s determined to get to the bottom of this matter. Based on certain clues, Ding Siu-fei reaches the container yard in his search.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Kill You Love You - EP 1
programme.desc: Rookie assassin Su Xian Ling (Zhu Li Lan) accidentally takes the order to assassinate Dong Fang Jing (Li Ruotian), unaware that the employer is the city lord himself. Jing pretends to be foolish to protect himself and falls for the unconventional Xian Ling.

programme.title: Kill You Love You - EP 2

programme.title: Kill You Love You - EP 3
programme.desc: Rookie assassin Su Xian Ling (Zhu Li Lan) accidentally takes the order to assassinate Dong Fang Jing (Li Ruotian), unaware that the employer is the city lord himself. Jing pretends to be foolish to protect himself and falls for the unconventional Xian Ling.

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 10
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Tin-cho worries about Cheung Hei, so he decides to ask Kwun-fung to help put her mind at ease. Kwun-fung also arranges for Cheung Hei to meet up with Wing-sze. Wai-lik and Ka-yu plan to get married. But Chun-sum still lives an empty life without love. Chun-pong is going to be promoted. In a large-scale operation, he runs into his “old love” Lan, who disappeared many years ago.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 5
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Chow Chun-kit is reinstated, but his innocence is doubtful. To reveal the truth, he asks Ko Ho-yin for help. The duo start to collaborate. Lau Yu-fan pays Lee Nga-man a visit. Lee Nga-man keeps improving himself in prison. The task force need more people, so Cheung Kin-bong joins Chow Chun-kit’s team.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 10
programme.desc: Based on Yee-ting’s statement, Inspector Lau approaches Lai-kei and questions her. Lai-kei thinks Yee-ting falsely accuses her of homicide, so she slaps her. Ho-yee wants to make up with Ko Tsun. But she sees a disheveled Chi-lam showing up at Ko Tsun’s home. On the pretext of a fire breaking out at Diamond Plaza, Sau-yi wants Ho-yee to put the group’s matters on the back burner and deal with the issues in the aftermath of the incident.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 6
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Forever Live Chairman Tung Kwai-shing hosts a press conference to offer a reward of HK$300 million for locating his missing daughter. Meanwhile, Lau Yu-fan asks Chow Chun-kit for help as he tells him about his missing daughter. And then Chow Chun-kit and Lau Yu-fan suspect the two missing person cases are related.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 13
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 11
programme.desc: Ho-yee’s secretary accepts a bribe from Chi-bun and then quickly leaves Hong Kong. Ho-yee just cannot question them. Police and Fire Services Department set up a task force to investigate the fire incident. Sau-yan is worried about Ho-yee ending up in prison, so he wants someone to become a scapegoat.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 751
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 6
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yi’s (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the school’s social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 18
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 5
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 6
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 25
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 26
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 16
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 5
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 1
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 10
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 10
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 11
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.
