programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 13
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fiance and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him...

programme.title: Demon Of The Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: Huan Zhu's ghost seeks help from "Fake Ghost Catchers" Bao Tuo and Zhou Peng, after a jealous suitor's ghost seeks vengeance by murdering her and now targeting her sister. Together with actor Wu Shun Chao who possesses a supernatural talent, they unite to protect Huan Zhu's sister from both mortal and spectral threats.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - "Twelve Deadly Coins" and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love...

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief's illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father's death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty's Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 37

programme.title: Always Home - EP 8

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 6

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 4

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: Kill You Love You - EP 1

Ho-yee wants to make up with Ko Tsun. But she sees a disheveled Chi-lam showing up at Ko Tsun’s home. On the pretext of a fire breaking out at Diamond Plaza, Sau-yi wants Ho-yee to put the group’s matters on the back burner and deal with the issues in the aftermath of the incident.
